scripts.preversion: git checkout main && git pull && npm ci && npm test
scripts.postversion: npm run add_package_files && npm run checkout_version_branch && npm run push_version_branch && npm run create_version_pr
scripts.create_version_pr: gh pr create --fill --base main --head version/$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) | grep -o 'https.*github.*' | xargs gh pr view --web
